column1: "description": "The table provides the Balance of Payments (BOP) (US$ million) as per IMF Balance of Payments Manual 5 - New Format. BOP mainly refers to the difference between a country's external financial assets and external liabilities. This table gives item-wise details for the years 2010-11
"title": "Download XLS for Balance of Payments - as per BPM6 new format (US$ million)(External Link that opens in a new window)"
